data.title: Films directed by Vic Morrow
data.text:
Victor "Vic" Morrow (February 14, 1929 â€“ July 23, 1982) was an American actor, whose credits include a starring role in the 1960s TV series Combat!, prominent roles in a handful of other television and cinema dramas, and numerous guest roles on television. He and two children died when a stunt helicopter crashed on them during the filming of Twilight Zone: The Movie.
